titleStmt.title: At the angel and crown in Basing-lane, being the second turning in Bread-street from Cheapside. Dwells a physician, a graduate in one of our own Universities, and a member of the Colledge of Physicians in London, who has a pill prepared with wholsom ingredients, ...
titleStmt.author: Pechey, John, 1655-1716.

notesStmt.note: Imprint and author information from Wing.
Item at reel position E8:2[70] imperfect: stained at head affecting caption title.
Item at reel position E8:2[75] is a variant setting with no comma after "ingredients" in 4th line of text.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
